data.message: Thank you for sharing this story! The greatest gift is sharing a smile with anyone and it is FREE! When you have a hunger for love or appreciation you will move mountains for anyone that shows you kindness! I LOVE ❤️ these stories- Thank you for filling me with joy and a song in my heart that there is HOPE !

replies.message: We're glad you liked it, Sherrie! If you've used Facebook to do something meaningful in your own life, for someone else, or in your community, we want to hear about it. You can tell us about your experience by emailing communityvoices@fb.com. -Anna
